entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime is described as a woman who is dressed in black satin and has opals gleaming at her throat and on her fingers. She is introduced by Dumbledore, and she walks forward to greet him.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as a tall person who starts clapping and greets Madame Maxime warmly. He is introduced as the one welcoming Madame Maxime to Hogwarts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone whose attention is focused on Madame Maxime, and he notices a group of students emerging from behind her.

relationships.description: Dumbledore greets Madame Maxime warmly, welcoming her to Hogwarts. This is described in the text as Dumbledore saying 'My dear Madame Maxime, welcome to Hogwarts'.
Madame Maxime is greeted by Dumbledore. This is described in the text as Madame Maxime saying 'Dumbly-dorr, I hope I find you well?'
Harry notices Madame Maxime and a group of students emerging from behind her. This is described in the text as Harry saying 'My pupils' when referring to the students.
